Verses: 1 vaasalkaakkiravargalin Vaguppugalaavana: Koraagiyar Sandhadhiyaana Aasaabin Puththirarile Koreyin Kumaaran Meshelemiyaa Enbavan,
2 meshelemiyaavin Kumaarar, Mooththavanaagiya Sagariyaavum,
3 edhiyaayel, Sepadhiyaa, Yadhaniyel, Elaam, Yoganaan, Eliyonaai Ennum Irandaam Moondraam Naankaam Aindhaam Aaraam Ezhaam Kumaararum;
4 obedh Edhomin Kumaarar, Mooththavanaagiya Semaayaavum,
5 yosabaadh, Yovaag, Saakkaar, Nedhaneyel, Ammiyel, Isakkaar, Peyuldhaayi Ennum Irandaam Moondraam Naangaam Aindhaam Aaraam Ezhaam Ettaam Kumaararume, Dhevan Avanai Aaseervadhiththirundhaar.
6 avan Kumaaranaagiya Semaayaavukkum Kumaarar Pirandhu, Avargal Paraakkiramasaaligalaayirundhu, Thangal Thagappan Kudumbaththaarai Aandaargal.
7 semaayaavukku Irundha Kumaarar Odhniyum, Balasaaligalaagiya Reppaayel, Obedh, Elsaabaadh Ennum Avan Sagodhararum, Elikoovum Semagiyaavume.
8 obedhedhomin Puththirarum Avargal Kumaararum Avargal Sagodhararumaagiya Oozhiyaththirkup Balaththa Paraakkiramasaaligalaana Avargalellaarum Arubaththiranduper.
9 meshelemiyaavin Kumaararum Sagodhararumaana Paraakkiramasaaligal Padhinettupper.
10 meraariyin Puththiraril Osaa Enbavanudaiya Kumaarargal: Simri Ennum Thalaimaiyaanavan; Ivan Mooththavanaayiraavittaalum Ivan Thagappan Ivanaith Thalaivanaaga Vaiththaan.
11 ilkkiyaa, Thepaliyaa, Sagariyaa Ennum Irandaam, Moondraam Naangaam Kumaararaanavargal; Osaavin Kumaararum Sagodhararum Ellaam Padhinmoondruper.
12 kaavalkaararaana Thalaivarin Keezhth Thangal Sagodhararukku Oththa Muraiyaai, Karththarudaiya Aalayaththil Vaasalkaakkiravargalaai Sevikka Ivargal Vagukkappattu,
13 thangal Pidhaakkalin Kudumbaththaaraagiya Siriyavargalum Periyavargalumaai Inna Vaasalukku Innaarendru Seettuppottukkondaargal.
14 keezhppuraththirku Selemiyaavukku Seettu Vizhundhadhu; Vivegamulla Yosanaikkaaranaagiya Sagariyaa Ennum Avan Kumaaranukku Seettup Pottapodhu, Avan Seettu Vadapuraththirkendru Vizhundhadhu.
15 obedhedhomukkuth Thenpuraththirkum, Avan Kumaararukku Asuppeem Veettirkum,
16 sooppeemukkum, Osaavukkum Manpottu Uyarththappatta Vazhiyum Kaavalukku Edhirkaavalum Irukkira Merpuramaana Vaasalukkum Seettu Vizhundhadhu.
17 kizhakke Leviyaraana Aaruperum, Vadakke Pagalile Naaluperum, Therke Pagalile Naaluperum, Asuppeem Veettandaiyil Irandiranduperum.
18 velippuramaana Vaasal Andaiyil Merke Irukkira Uyarndha Vazhikku Naaluperum, Velippuramaana Vazhiyile Iranduperum Vaikkappattaargal.
19 koraagin Puththirarukkullum, Meraariyin Puththirarukkullum, Vaasalkaakkiravargalin Vaguppugal Ivaigale.
20 matra Leviyaril Agiyaa Enbavan Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththup Pokkishangalaiyum, Pradhishtaiyaakkappatta Porulgalin Pokkishangalaiyum Visaarikkiravanaayirundhaan.
21 laadhaanin Kumaarar Yaarendraal Kersoniyanaana Avanudaiya Kumaararil Thalaimaiyaana Pidhaakkalaayirundha Yegiyeliyum,
22 yegiyeliyin Kumaararaagiya Seththaamum, Avan Sagodharanaagiya Yovelume; Ivargal Karththarudaiya Aalayaththup Pokkishangalai Visaarikkiravargalaayirundhaargal.
23 amraamiyarilum, Idhseyaariyarilum, Eproniyarilum, Oosiyeriyarilum, Silar, Appadiye Visaarikkiravargalaayirundhaargal.
24 moseyin Kumaaranaagiya Kersomin Sandhadhiyaana Sebuvel Pokkishappradhaaniyaayirundhaan.
25 eliyesar Moolamaai Avanukku Irundha Sagodhararaanavargal, Ivan Kumaaran Regabiyaavum, Ivan Kumaaran Eshaayaavum, Ivan Kumaaran Yoraamum, Ivan Kumaaran Sikkiriyum, Ivan Kumaaran Selomiththume.
26 raajaavaagiya Dhaaveedhum, Aayiramperukku Adhipadhigalum, Nooruperukku Adhipadhigalumaana Pidhaakkalin Thalaivarum, Senaadhipadhigalum Yuththaththil Agappatta Kollaigalil Eduththu,
27 karththarudaiya Aalayaththaip Paribaalikkumpadikkup Parisuththam Endru Nerndhukonda Porulgalin Pokkishangalaiyellaam Andha Selomiththum Avanudaiya Sagodhararum Visaariththaargal.

28 gnaanadhrushtikkaaranaagiya Saamuvelum, Keesin Kumaaranaagiya Savulum, Nerin Kumaaranaagiya Apnerum, Seruyaavin Kumaararaagiya Yovaabum, Avaravar Parisuththam Endru Nerndhukonda Anaiththum Selomiththin Kaiyinkeezhum Avan Sagodharar Kaiyinkeezhum Irundhadhu.
29 idhseyaariyaril Kenaaniyaavum Avan Kumaararum Dhesakaariyangalaip Paarkkumpadi Vaikkappattu, Isravelinmel Visaarippukkaararum Maniyakaararumaayirundhaargal.

30 eproniyaril Asabiyaavum Avan Sagodhararumaagiya Aayiraththu Ezhunooru Paraakkiramasaaligal Yordhaanukku Ippaale, Merke Irukkira Isravelin Karththarudaiya Ellaa Oozhiyaththirkum Raajaavin Velaikkum Vaikkappattaargal.

31 eproniyaril Eriyaavum Irundhaan; Avan Than Pidhaakkalin Vamsangalaana Eproniyaril Thalaimaiyaanavan; Dhaaveedhu Arasaanda Naarpadhaam Varushaththile Avargal Thedappattapodhu Avargalukkulle Keeleyaaththesaththu Eserile Paraakkirama Veerar Kaanappattaargal.

32 balasaaligalaagiya Avanudaiya Sagodharar Irandaayiraththu Ezhunooru Pradhaana Thalaivaraayirundhaargal; Avargalai Dhaaveedhu Raajaa Dhevanukkaduththa Sagala Kaariyaththirkaagavum, Raajaavin Kaariyadhkirkaagavum, Roobaniyarmelum, Kaadhiyarmelum, Manaaseyin Paadhikkoththiraththinmelum Vaiththaan.
